string-array.name: falling_phrases
string-array.item: will you believe me when im covered in blood?
(mylove 1/3) my love runs deeper than words,
(mylove 3/3) more than i´ll ever tell you.
your happiness was all i ever wanted
(prep 2/2) but it didn´t hurt any less
we accept the love we think we deserve

why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why why

string-array.name: rising_phrases
string-array.item: stay up late, wake up late.
you are right where your habits got you
(adv 2/2) from someone you wouldn´t take advise?
(oneblf 2/2) has no need to convince others
